Hello!

Does anyone have any thoughts or experience with Parasoft's JTest 
product? It is integrated with Eclipse to use JUnit.

On the upside I see that there is the knowledge that at least some 
unit testing is being done to all code. Most of the developers here 
do not test.

On the downside (my personal opinion), test-writing first or at least 
at the same time as coding is much more effective than test-writing 
after the fact. Code written without testing in mind is not very 
testable. I don't see how JTest can help there although the code 
standards module would seem to help.


For those who don't know, Parasoft's JTest is a tool to automatically 
generate tests for your code. It does a number of other things also.

Thanks!
